spell_tooltip.description: Creates a cloud of thick smoke in an 8 yard radius around the Rogue for 5 sec. Enemies are unable to target into or out of the smoke cloud.
Disarm the enemy, preventing the use of any weapons or shield for 5 sec.
Feint decreases your damage taken by an additional 40% while stunned and its energy cost is reduced by 30%.
Blinds all enemies near the target, causing them to wander disoriented for 18 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 5 sec.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.
Blind has 50% reduced cooldown, 70% reduced duration, and applies to all nearby enemies.
Shadowstep has 1 additional charge.
Increases the non-damaging effects of your weapon poisons by 20%.
Evasion also reduces damage taken by 20%, and Feint also reduces non-area-of-effect damage taken by 20%.
Redirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next damaging attack within the next 30 sec and lasting 6 sec.
Energy cost of Feint and Crimson Vial reduced by 10.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
While Stealth or Shadow Dance is active, you move 20% faster.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Sprint increases movement speed by an additional 30% and has 4 sec increased duration.
The Energy costs of Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Sap, and Distract are reduced by 20%.
Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance of poisoning the enemy, reducing their damage by 3.6% for 10 sec.
Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.
Feint has 1 additional charge.
Shroud of Concealment has 50% reduced cooldown.
Increases the critical strike chance of your attacks that generate combo points by 5%.
Auto-attacks increase auto-attack damage and movement speed by 1.0% for 3 sec, stacking up to 10%.
Energy cost of finishing moves reduced by 6%.
Slice and Dice heals you for up to 1% of your maximum health per 3 sec.
Your finishing moves have a 10% chance per combo point to grant 1% Haste for 15 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
You are healed for 30% of your maximum health over 6 sec after activating Vanish.

Shiv supercharges 2 combo points.

Damaging finishing moves consume a supercharged combo point to function as if they spent 2 additional combo points.

Abilities requiring Stealth can be used for 6 sec after Stealth breaks.

Combat benefits requiring Stealth persist for an additional 6 sec after Stealth breaks.
Increase the bonus granted when a damaging finishing move consumes a supercharged combo point by 1.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.
Vanish has 1 additional charge.
Sinister Strike has a 35% chance to hit an additional time, making your next Pistol Shot half cost and double damage.
Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 50%, your maximum Energy by 50, and your attack speed by 20% for 20 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Grappling Hook by 15 sec, and increases its retraction speed.
Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 30%.
Stamina increased by 5%.
Movement speed increased by 15%.
Restless Blades now also reduces the remaining cooldown of Evasion and Feint by 0.5 sec per combo point spent.
Between the Eyes and Pistol Shot have 10 yd increased range, and Pistol Shot reduces the the target's damage done to you by 5%.

Gain 1 additional max combo point.

Your finishing moves that consume more than 5 combo points have increased effects, and your finishing moves deal 5% increased damage.

Finishing move that teleports to an enemy within 10 yds, striking with both weapons for Physical damage. Number of strikes increased per combo point.

100% of damage taken during effect is delayed, instead taken over 8 sec.

   1 point  : 542,135 over 0.36 sec
   2 points: 813,203 over 0.72 sec
   3 points: 1 million over 1.08 sec
   4 points: 1.3 million over 1.44 sec
   5 points: 1.6 million over 1.80 sec
   6 points: 1.8 million over 2.15 sec
Your off-hand attacks have a 50% chance to generate 10 Energy.
Half-cost uses of Pistol Shot granted by Sinister Strike now generate 1 additional combo point, and deal 20% additional damage.
Blade Flurry's initial damage is increased by 100% and generates 1 combo point per target struck.
Your finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point spent to grant a combo point.
Roll the Bones has a 20% increased chance of granting additional matches.
Versatility increased by 3%.
Critical strikes with Between the Eyes deal four times normal damage.
Sinister Strike has a 15% chance to strike with both weapons after it strikes an additional time.
Generate full combo points when you gain Adrenaline Rush, and full Energy when it ends.
Blade Flurry strikes 3 additional enemies and its duration is increased by 3 sec.

Blade Flurry does not lose duration during Adrenaline Rush.

Adrenaline Rush does not lose duration while Stealthed.
Ambush, Sinister Strike, and Dispatch have a 15% chance to grant you a Roll the Bones combat enhancement buff you do not already have for 8 sec.
Between the Eyes has a 5% chance per combo point spent to grant 5 combo points.
Blade Flurry damage is increased by an additional 5% per missing target below its maximum.

When your Dispatch consumes 5 or more combo points, Dispatch deals 6% increased damage and costs 5 less Energy for 15 sec.

Max 5 stacks. Adding a stack does not refresh the duration.

When Sinister Strike strikes an additional time, gain 2 additional stacks of Opportunity. Max 6 stacks.

Half-cost uses of Pistol Shot consume 2 additional stacks of Opportunity to fire 2 additional shots. Additional shots generate 1 fewer combo point and deal 20% reduced damage.

Entering Stealth refreshes the cooldown of Between the Eyes.

Between the Eyes has no cooldown and also Dispatches the target for 50% of normal damage when used from Stealth.
Increase the remaining duration of your active Roll the Bones combat enhancements by 30 sec.

Backstab and Shadowstrike now also strike with an Unseen Blade dealing 491,239 damage. Targets struck are Fazed for 10 sec.

Fazed enemies take 5% more damage from you and cannot parry your attacks.

This effect may occur once every 20 sec.
Attacks that generate combo points deal 50% increased critical strike damage to Fazed targets.
Feint reduces damage taken from area-of-effect attacks by an additional 10%

Unseen Blade and Secret Technique increase the damage of your finishing moves by 3% for 12 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Tricks of the Trade's threat redirect duration is increased to 1 hour.
Secret Technique applies Fazed to any targets struck.
Slice and Dice grants 10% additional attack speed and gives your auto-attacks a chance to refresh your opportunity to strike with Unseen Blade.
Secret Technique has 10% reduced cooldown and allows your next 2 strikes of Unseen Blade to ignore its cooldown.
Finishing moves have 10% increased chance to critically strike Fazed targets.
Your auto-attacks, Backstab, Shadowstrike, and Eviscerate also strike up to 7 additional nearby targets for 60% of normal damage while Flawless Form is active.

After 4 strikes with Unseen Blade, your next Eviscerate will be performed as a Coup de Grace, functioning as if it had consumed 5 additional combo points.

If the primary target is Fazed, gain 5 stacks of Flawless Form.

Attack with your poisoned blades, dealing 166,192 Physical damage, dispelling all enrage effects and applying a concentrated form of your active Non-Lethal poison.

Your Nature and Bleed damage done to the target is increased by 30% for 8 sec.

Awards 1 combo point.

Fatal attacks instead reduce you to 7% of your maximum health. For 3 sec afterward, you take 85% reduced damage. Cannot trigger more often than once per 6 min.

When your Energy is reduced below 30, drink a Thistle Tea.

You cannot be slowed below 70% of normal movement speed while your Fatebound Coin flips have an active streak of at least 2 flips matching the same face.
Mutilate, Ambush, and Fan of Knives generate 1 additional combo point when they trigger Seal Fate.
Activating Deathmark flips a Fatebound Coin and causes it to land on its edge, counting as both Heads and Tails.
Fate Intertwined duplicates 30% of Envenom critical strike damage as Cosmic to 2 additional nearby enemies. If there are no additional nearby targets, duplicate 30% to the primary target instead.

Damage dealt when your Fatebound Coin flips tails is increased by 30% if there are no other enemies near the target.

Each additional nearby enemy reduces this bonus by 6%.
Weapon poisons have 5% increased application chance and your Fatebound Coins flipped have an additional 5% chance to match the same face as the last flip.
Your first Fatebound Coin flip after breaking Stealth flips two coins that are guaranteed to match the same outcome.

When your Fatebound Coin flips the same face for the seventh time in a row, keep the lucky coin to gain 7% Agility until you leave combat for 10 seconds. If you already have a lucky coin, it instead deals 628,036 Cosmic damage to your target.

Attack with your poisoned blades, dealing 164,949 Physical damage, dispelling all enrage effects and applying a concentrated form of your active Non-Lethal poison.

Your Nature and Bleed damage done to the target is increased by 30% for 8 sec.

Awards 1 combo point.
Blinds all enemies near the target, causing them to wander disoriented for 18 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect. Limit 1.
Provides a moment of magic immunity, instantly removing all harmful spell effects. The cloak lingers, causing you to resist harmful spells for 5 sec.
Increases your dodge chance by 100% for 10 sec.
Blind has 50% reduced cooldown, 70% reduced duration, and applies to all nearby enemies.
Shadowstep has 1 additional charge.
Increases the non-damaging effects of your weapon poisons by 20%.
Fatal attacks instead reduce you to 7% of your maximum health. For 3 sec afterward, you take 85% reduced damage. Cannot trigger more often than once per 6 min.
Redirects all threat you cause to the targeted party or raid member, beginning with your next damaging attack within the next 30 sec and lasting 6 sec.
Energy cost of Feint and Crimson Vial reduced by 10.
Reduces the cooldown of Sprint by 60 sec.
